## Summary

Describe the feature briefly.

## Motivation

Why do we need this? What problem does it solve?

## Proposed Solution

Outline how the feature should work. Include flows, UX notes, or API contracts if available.

## Alternatives Considered

Mention other approaches evaluated and why they were dismissed.

## Additional Context

Related issues, dependencies, or references.
